metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26496 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In nbd-server in nbd before 3.24, there is a stack-based buffer overflow. An attacker can cause a buffer overflow in the parsing of the name field by sending a crafted NBD_OPT_INFO or NBD_OPT_GO message with an large value as the length of the name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26496` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nbd-client - 1:3.21-1ubuntu0.1
nbd-server - 1:3.21-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nbd package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.21-1ubuntu0.1').
